title: Bridging fund request for a measurement of the anomalous magnetic moment of the muon to a precision of 0.14ppm using the FNAL g-2 experiment.
impactText: Successfully bridged funding gap to ST/L00186/1 Education,Other
findingsText: This bridging funding enabled us to set up our collaboration with the g-2 experiment and initiate the design and development of prototype detector for the experiment. not applicable. Education,Other
